articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects University of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects University of KPA Unit
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the University of KPA Unit 10215.
					 He first visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing at the university. Then he went round the monument to the on-the-spot guidance given by the President, the room for the education in his revolutionary activities and the room devoted to the history of the university, conducted by its rector. 
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the shining history of the university, he said that thanks to the outstanding military idea and wise leadership of the President the KPA could develop into ever-victorious and matchless ranks. The immortal exploits performed by the President are brilliantly recorded in the history of the KPA. 
					
					 Then he looked round military study rooms to learn in detail about the education. 
					
					 He was pleased to learn that the university has manufactured a variety of visual facilities and equipment for experiment and practice and conducted effective education in principles and actions so that all its students might firmly arm themselves with the Juche-oriented war methods of the WPK. 
					
					 He stressed that in order to train the students into able commanding officers equipped with rich military knowledge and commanding ability it is necessary to strengthen the practical education and education with the help of visual aids, steadily improve the contents of education and further increase the role of teachers as required by the developing reality. 
					
					Then, he looked round the interior and exterior of the university and highly praised it for having effectively conducted the diverse political work for strengthening the revolutionary education and class education among its students and planted a lot of trees in and around the campus to suit the educational environment. He underscored the need for the military educational institutions to take the lead in implementing the WPK's line and policies. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the teaching staff of the university, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they have successfully spruced up the university in an educational and cultured manner and made successes by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm to training hardcore officers of the Korean People's Army true to the WPK's military line in the past. He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the university. 
					
					 He had a photo taken with the teaching staff of the university.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, department director of the C.C., the WPK who is member of the NDC of the DPRK, and KPA General Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation on Sustainable Economic and Social Development in Asia-Pacific
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation on Sustainable Economic and Social Development in Asia-Pacific
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will contribute to the efforts of the Asia-Pacific region to attain the millennium target of development through the efforts to achieve the economic development of the country and solve the food scarcity in the future, too. The head of the DPRK delegation said this, when referring to the issue of the sustainable economic and social development in Asia-Pacific at the 65th meeting of the Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific of the UN held in Thailand on April 28. 
					 He said:
					
					 The serious fluctuation of food and oil prices and climatic change at present as well as the deepening financial crisis are creating difficulties in the way of achieving economic and social development and attaining the millennium target of development in this region. 
					
					 It is essential for each country to decisively boost the grain production on the principle of self-sufficiency in view of the present most serious food crisis in an effort to meet its domestic need for food by itself and increase the regional efforts for the sustainable development of agriculture in developing countries. 
					
					 It is necessary for the developed countries to faithfully fulfill their duties to reduce the emissions of greenhouse gas, make investment in developing countries, transfer technologies to them without any condition and remove artificial barriers in the way of trade of those countries in order to meet the challenge of climatic change and its threat and weather energy crisis. 
					
					 He stressed that all policies and work should be oriented to achieving the sustainable development and attaining the millennium target of development and to this end the above-said commission should play an important role as a coordinator.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK is bringing about signal innovations in all fields of the national economy and focusing and mobilizing all efforts for farming in a vigorous endeavor to solve the food scarcity by itself under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Zealand Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Zealand Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from  Richard Stuart Mann , New Zealand ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Croatian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Croatian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Ante Simonic, Croatian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					 After receiving the credentials Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea issued a statement on May 4 denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities for their suppression of the just struggle of the south Korean people of all strata including workers against the Lee Myung Bak group's sycophancy, treachery, confrontation with fellow countrymen, fascist rule and its unpopular policy on the occasion of May Day. 
					 The statement said:
					
					The group mobilized a huge police force to brutally suppress and arrest hundreds of participants in the "May Day All-People Meeting" attended by more than 50,000 persons including members of at least 500 civic and public organizations and political parties including the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and citizens on May Day and a 100-day mourning service held by people of different strata for the evacuees in Ryongsan, Seoul who were cruelly killed while struggling to protect their cradle after branding them as "illegal" actions.
					
					 The above-said suppression was a fascist action and a crime against people of all strata including workers who turned out in the struggle for new democratic politics and new life. 
					
					 The popular struggle that raged in south Korea on the occasion of May Day was an eruption of the pent-up grudge and resentment of all people at the group of traitors who imposed unbearable misfortune and pain upon them and drove the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase. 
					
					 It was quite natural and just for the people of all strata in south Korea including workers to have turned out in the anti-"government" actions in its different parts, holding high the slogans such as "No conclusion of south Korea-U.S. FTA!", "Settle Ryongsan tragedy!" "No enactment of 'Lee Myung Bak evil laws'!", "Push forward south-north dialogue and proposal for cooperation!" and "Lee Myung Bak regime step down!"
					
					 The fascist suppression by the group will only trigger off stronger resistance of the people as it is nothing but the death-bed frenzy of the doomed. 
					
					 The group should stop at once suppressing the people of various strata in their struggle for democratic freedom and rights and immediately release the arrested people.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Youth and Students under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Youth and Students under Fire
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League released a statement on Tuesday denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for brutally suppressing the youth and students of south Korea who turned out in the struggle against the unpopular policy and fascist rule of the ruling quarters and their flunkeyism and treachery and anti-reunification moves in connection with the lapse of 100 days since the tragic killing of evacuees in Ryongsan, on the occasion of May Day and one year since the candlelight action. 
					 The statement branded the group's wholesale suppression of the youth and students who participated in the demonstration and rally as a blatant challenge to the desire of the south Korean youth and students to bring their noble ideal and desire into full bloom in a new independent and democratic society and unpardonable violation of democracy and human rights.
					
					 It accused the Lee group of not only trampling down upon the freedom and right of the youth and students to learn but indiscriminately cracking down upon those desirous of national reunification on the charge of violating the "National Security Law" and incriminating and blocking the contacts and exchanges between the youth and students in the north and the south. 
					
					 There can be neither genuine life nor hopeful future for the youth and students in south Korea as long as the Lee group of traitors to the nation is allowed to stay in power contrary to the times and the aspiration of the nation, the statement noted, calling upon the south Korean youth and students to unite close as one with the people from all walks of life and wage a more vigorous struggle to settle accounts with the Lee group just as they put strong impetus to the movement for independence, democracy and reunification by playing the roles of torches that sparked off the April 19 and October popular resistances, the Kwangju Popular Uprising and the June Popular Resistance.
					
					 The Lee group should stop at once the suppression of the youth and students, aware that its frantic fascist suppression would only precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Organization under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Organization under Fire
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on Tuesday to condemn the Lee Myung Bak group for taking such fascist action as imposing heavy penalties upon leading members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration after labeling it as "an enemy-benefiting organization" on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law (NSL)," an anti-reunification fascist law. 
					 The solidarity has taken the lead in implementing the inter-Korean joint declarations even under the difficult situation, prompted by the single desire to bring earlier national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, and it has, therefore, enjoyed unreserved support and praises from the compatriots. 
					
					 Noting that the above-said action taken against the organization is a reckless one which can be committed only by such ferocious gang of anti-reunification elements as the Lee group working hard to quell the desire of the compatriots for reunification, persistently blocking the implementation of the north-south declarations, the wishes of all Koreans, the statement went on:
					
					 The above-mentioned sentence revealed the sinister intention of the Lee group as it was not an issue confined to the solidarity but a prelude to an unprecedented repressive campaign to be kicked off under the pretext of "public security" to crack down upon all the forces supporting the June 15 joint declaration and arrest the just and patriotic struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification. 
					
					 If the Lee group of traitors persists in the suppression of the forces supporting the June 15 joint declaration despite the unanimous protest and denunciation by all compatriots, it will not be able to escape a thousand-fold severer punishment by the whole nation.
					
					 The group should lift at once the label of "enemy-benefiting organization" attached to the reunification movement organizations and immediately release the patriotic personages who were unjustly punished.

articles.title: DPRK-China Friendship City Meeting to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
DPRK-China Friendship City Meeting to Be Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK-China friendship city meeting will be taking place here amid great attention and expectation of the peoples of the two countries.
					 The meeting will be expected to swap the achievements and experience made in developing the relations between friendship provinces and cities of the DPRK and China and discuss the matters of forging friendly relations between cities and boosting exchange and cooperation among them in the future.
					
					 The meeting to be held this year, a "year of DPRK-China friendship", will be helpful to further consolidating the friendly relations, a precious treasure, provided by the revolutionaries of elder generation of the two countries and brilliantly adorning the year of friendship.

articles.title: 4th Symposium on Architectural Beauty Held
articles.content:
4th Symposium on Architectural Beauty Held
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The 4th symposium on architectural beauty took place here Tuesday. 
					 Present at the symposium were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, members of the Cabinet, officials in the fields of architecture, construction and building materials industry in Pyongyang and local areas, designers, technicians, teachers, researchers and creators.
					
					 The symposium listened to speeches made by Pae Tal Jun, minister of State Construction Control, Ri Ju Ul, director of the City Designing Research Institute in South Hamgyong Province, Kim Myong Gol, director of the Paektusan Architectural Institute, Kim Ung Gwan, minister of Capital City Construction, Ri Paek Ha, vice-minister of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, Kim Song Min, vice-director of the Mansudae Art Studio, Pae Tong Il, rector of Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, and Sim Yong Hak, vice-minister of State Construction Control.
					
					 Speakers introduced achievements and experience gained in the recent reconstruction and renovation of various buildings, true to the Juche-based architectural idea of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They explained the theoretical and practical issues arising in successfully building all structures into monumental edifices in the era of Songun including the issue of further developing architecture and construction in line with the world trend and the specific conditions of Korea.

articles.title: Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science Held
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The 11th Pyongyang symposium of Koreans at home and abroad on medical science took place at the People's Palace of Culture on May 4 and 5.
					 Present there were officials in the field of public health including Ri Pong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Medical Association, and medical scientists, a delegation of Korean doctors in Japan led by Ri Tae Guk, chairman of the Korean Medical Association in Japan, and a delegation of Korean doctors in the U.S. led by Pak Mun Jae, vice-chairman of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S.
					
					 Ri Pong Hun said in an opening address at the symposium that he hoped the symposium would make a positive contribution to putting the medical science and technology of the nation on a new level in the idea of "By our nation itself" and achieving the eternal prosperity of the country.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made by the heads of the above-said delegations.
					
					 A video titled "The Pyongyang Symposium of Koreans at Home and Abroad on Medical Science" was shown there.
					
					 Then followed internal medicine and external medicine panel discussions.
					
					 Its participants heard dozens of valuable papers including "On the headache", "The surgical treatment of cerebral apoplexy", "Study of early diagnosis of lung cancer" and "Medical service to cancer cases".
					
					 The papers introduced successes and experience gained in solving the urgent scientific and technological problems arising in the constitutional characteristics of Koreans and public health practices in the DPRK and introducing ultra-modern science and technology to the prevention of diseases and their treatment.

articles.title: Tradition of Great National Unity in Korea
articles.content:
Tradition of Great National Unity in Korea
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The banner of unity that has been let fly vigorously in the Korean revolution has been inspiring the people to new victories year by year through centuries with its immense attraction and vitality.
					 The grand realities in which the Korean people are building a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation with the might of close unity of the leader, the Party, the army and the people, frustrating the moves of the imperialists, have been brought by the wise leadership of the peerlessly great persons who put forth the programme of great national unity long ago and carried it forward.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung convened the historical Donggang meeting on May 5, Juche 25 (1936) and founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, the first organization of the anti-Japanese national united front in Korea.
					
					 The ARF grew into a pan-national organization with a membership of hundreds of thousands in a brief time since its formation and it powerfully backed the victory of the anti-Japanese armed struggle by mobilizing broad masses in rendering active aid, material and military, to the Korean People's Revolutionary Army.
					
					 Thanks to the tradition of great national unity established by the President, the Korean people could turn out as one man in the building of a new country in the complicated situation after the liberation, those with strength giving strength, those with knowledge dedicating knowledge and those with money donating money, to successfully carry out an anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution, and worked the political and military miracle in the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialist aggressors through an all-people death-defying war of resistance.
					
					 The President convened the historical April north-south joint conference and put forward the programme of national reunification and great national unity. In the later period, he advanced the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- and the Ten-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country, thus providing the great programme of national unity and reunification, and pushed vigorously ahead with the reunification movement on the track of national independence.
					
					The President's idea of great national unity and the great tradition of revolutionary unity established by him and his feats in this are being carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on a new, higher level today.
					
					 He saw to it that the historic June 15 north-south joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, its practical programme, were made public, thereby opening up a bright vista for bringing earlier the reunification of the country with the concerted efforts of the whole nation.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the Korean people will certainly accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, holding aloft the banner of great national unity.

articles.title: Outbursts of Commander of U.S. Forces in S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
Outbursts of Commander of U.S. Forces in S. Korea Blasted
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea, recently let loose a spate of balderdash that "the U.S. is firmly committed to providing a nuclear umbrella" to south Korea and "'OPLAN 5029' would be rounded off," claiming that the U.S.-south Korea "treaty of mutual defense" signed in 1953 will remain valid though the "right to command wartime operations" is transferred to south Korea. He went the lengths of blustering that the U.S. forces are "maintaining a prompt combat posture" to cope with someone's "emergency situation."
					 Commenting on his utterances, news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says: Lurking behind his reckless remarks is the intention of the U.S. to step up the preparations for a war against the DPRK, keeping its forces in south Korea even after the above-said right is transferred to the south Korean puppets. 
					
					 The military nexus between the U.S. and the south Korean puppets is getting closer with the above-mentioned transfer as a momentum, the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					 By tightening this military nexus the U.S. bellicose forces seek to achieve its criminal purpose of instigating the south Korean puppets to commit military provocations against the DPRK and igniting a new all-out war on the Korean Peninsula under this pretext.
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. imperialists to neutralize the DPRK's capability for military operations through surprise indiscriminate preemptive strikes in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula and conclude the second Korean war by waging a blitz with huge U.S. reinforcements including rapid task forces from the Pacific region and the U.S. mainland involved.
					
					 The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea put pressure on the DPRK to dismantle its nuclear weapons while crying out for "rounding off" their scenario for a war of aggression against it and providing a "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea. This is little short of demanding the DPRK lay down arms and sit idle. 
					
					 Now that the hostile forces have more clearly revealed their design to seize the DPRK by force of arms it is compelled to bolster up its nuclear deterrent. 
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces would be well advised to behave themselves, clearly understanding who their rival is.

articles.title: S. Korean Defence Minister's Act of Treachery Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Defence Minister's Act of Treachery Flayed
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Defence Minister Ri Sang Hui during his recent junket to Japan held "talks" with his Japanese counterpart at which he called for "strengthening solidarity among the U.S., Japan and south Korea in pressurizing the DPRK to "dismantle its nuclear weapons" and behaved so recklessly as to sign a "protocol on exchange in defence." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Ri did proved that he is the cursed pro-Japanese lackey keen to do harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with the sworn enemy of the nation without hesitation, while seeking a way out in the cooperation with outside forces, bereft of even an iota of independence. 
					
					 By "stronger solidarity with the U.S. and Japan" he meant strengthening international cooperation in confrontation with the DPRK and the "exchanges in defence" on which he agreed with his Japanese master is, in essence, part of the collusion and nexus for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The reckless remarks made by Ri brought to light once again the true colors of the treacherous group as sycophants and traitors and its bellicose intention to realize at any cost its wild ambition to hurt fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign aggressor forces, kowtowing to them. 
					
					 It is not hard to guess what catastrophic consequences would be entailed by the conspiracy and tie-up with the Japanese militarist forces that are watching for a chance of reinvasion. 
					
					 However, the DPRK remains undeterred by the confrontation racket kicked up by the stooges of the imperialist aggression forces backed by their masters. It will only reinforce the determination of the people of the DPRK to settle accounts with the traitors to the nation to the last a thousand times. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group had better to stop at once the reckless act of precipitating its self-destruction, mindful that its moves to stifle fellow countrymen in collusion with the sworn enemies of the nation are unpardonable acts of treachery.

articles.title: Lee Group's Fascist Crackdown upon Pro-Reunification Organization Denounced
articles.content:
Lee Group's Fascist Crackdown upon Pro-Reunification Organization Denounced
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet court held a trial of members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration at which it sentenced its leading members to heavy penalties after labeling it an "enemy-benefiting one" on the charge of violation of the ill-famed "National Security Law (NSL)". 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: This was an unpardonable fascist action of the Lee Myung Bak group to illegalize the activities in south Korea for implementing the north-south joint declarations and destroy the progressive organizations for the reunification movement one by one.
					
					 The righteous activities conducted by the solidarity, a legitimate organization for the reunification movement, since its formation deserve praises of all the countrymen, far from being a target of suppression. 
					
					 What merits serious attention is that the above-said fascist action was taken against the organization at a time when the north-south relations were brought to total collapse and the suppression of the progressive organizations is getting intensified in south Korea as the days go by. This fully disclosed the Lee group's treacherous design to destroy all the organizations for the reunification movement in south Korea. 
					
					 As the reality indicates, if the group of traitors is allowed to go scot-free while resorting to the fascist suppression of those organizations it is quite impossible to implement the north-south joint declarations nor is it possible to settle the deteriorated north-south relations.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group would be well advised to halt at once the fascist crackdown upon the above-said organizations and the patriotic personages, bearing in mind that its moves to strengthen the fascist rule under the signboard of "pragmatism," going against the trend of the times, are little short of adding to its crimes committed against the nation.

articles.title: War Hysteria of Japanese Militarist Viper Flailed
articles.content:
War Hysteria of Japanese Militarist Viper Flailed
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinjo Abe, when meeting with the president and the vice-president of the United States during his recent visit to the U.S., cried out for re-listing the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" and "mounting a preemptive attack" on it. It is, in essence, little short of advocating a war against the DPRK.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Abe group is misinterpreting the complicated situation created due to the unjust behaviors of the hostile forces taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch in a bid to turn the situation more favorable to its policy of confrontation with the DPRK and realize its wild ambition for invading Korea at any cost.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula often underwent turns and twists in the past because such militarist right-wing elements as Abe kicked up noisy anti-DPRK rackets.
					
					 The peace and stability of the situation of the Korean Peninsula require a political reaction based on a high scientific calculation and logic for their characteristics and acute nature.
					
					 The political stance of the narrow-minded Japanese reactionaries influenced by emotion without any calculation is apt to make a mess of everything.
					
					 The Japanese militarist vipers such as illogical Abe bereft of any sense of morality and feeling no shame are nothing but by-products of the human world and trouble-makers of the international community.
					
					 Accordingly, the Japanese reactionaries should be thoroughly excluded from the process of settling all the international issues, the issue of the Korean Peninsula in particular.
					
					 This is a conclusion drawn by the DPRK, dropping the curtain on the six-party talks and a lesson for the international community to learn.
					
					 Abe and other Japanese right-wing reactionaries should know that their frantic row would get them nowhere.
					
					 If Japan truly seeks a solution by war, the army and people of the DPRK will not avoid it but take the opportunity to have the pent-up grudge of the Koreans settled a thousand times. 
					
					 Such guys as Abe had better behave themselves, pondering over the miserable end that awaits them.

articles.title: Anti-U.S., Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle Declared
articles.content:
Anti-U.S., Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle Declared
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement on May 1 declaring the will to stage a dynamic struggle against the U.S. and Lee Myung Bak in solidarity with the workers. 
					 The statement said that the Korean Peninsula is standing at the crucial crossroads of war and peace due to the moves of the U.S. imperialists, Japan and the Lee regime for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Recalling that the U.S. imperialists and the pro-U.S. bellicose forces are perpetrating subversive acts and exploitation under the signboard of "peace," the statement noted that their hysteria has reached an extremely serious phase. 
					
					 The statement called on the workers, peasants and youth and students to struggle to the last to root up the Lee fascist dictatorship under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 It stressed that the members of the said organization would turn out as one in the struggle for destroying the "Lee fortress" standing in the way of building a new independent, democratic and reunified country in solidarity with the workers.

articles.title: Candlelight Action in Seoul
articles.content:
Candlelight Action in Seoul
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life staged an anti-"government" candlelight action in Seoul on May 2 one year since the candlelight struggle against the unpopular rule of traitor Lee Myung Bak raged. 
					 It was participated in by members of civic and public organizations including the Joint Conference of Citizens for Candlelight Actions, the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Press Trade Union and the Solidarity for Patriotic Candlelight Actions, youth and students, figures of opposition parties and citizens from all walks of life.
					
					 The action lasted for seven hours in the acute confrontation with fascist policemen. 
					
					 The participants in the action forced the riot police to leave Seoul Railway Station before holding a candlelight meeting.
					
					 The speakers at the meeting bitterly condemned the authorities for their vicious moves to block the meeting, demanding that "Lee Myung Bak be dragged out of Chongwadae to the plaza."
					
					 They declared that they would show once again the candlelight raised by the people will never go out just as the recent "by-election of members of the National Assembly" served a warning to the Lee Myung Bak regime and the "Grand National Party." 
					
					 A declaration read out at the meeting made it clear that the people in this land angered by the unpopular rule of the Lee regime have turned out in this joint struggle, unable to endure the present sufferings any longer. 
					
					 The Lee regime should bear in mind that if it persists in its moves to enact various kinds of evil laws or make a retrogressive revision of the existing ones in a bid to wantonly infringe upon the people's right of existence, incriminate the just activities of civic and public organizations and suppress them, this will be little short of digging its grave itself, it warned. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants staged a demonstration. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century held an anti-"government" meeting and staged a demonstration in Seoul on the same day and students in middle and higher schools from across south Korea held a candlelight meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Army Day Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Army Day Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar for the study of the Songun idea, a DPRK book and photo exhibition and a film show took place in Pakistan and film shows in Finland and Nepal from April 23 to 25 on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army. 
					Displayed in the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos showing their immortal feats performed in commanding the army.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events. 
					
					Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies, praised Kim Il Sung as the outstanding thinker and theoretician and man of action in the 20th century who founded the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea, saving the destiny of the Korean nation and putting an end to the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies, said that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the KPA has developed into the invincible armed forces strong in political, ideological, military and technical potentials, firmly protecting the sovereignty and security of the DPRK.
					
					  Taji Haider, former senator from the Pakistan People's Party, noted that thanks to the ever-victorious Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula are firmly guaranteed and the KPA has grown into invincible powerful armed forces capable of beating back any aggressors. 
					
					 Kalevi Warman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' Association, noted that the friends of Korea in Finland expressed full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people to win the final victory of the socialist cause, foiling all moves of the imperialists. 
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched DPRK films "The 75th Founding Anniversary of the Heroic Korean People's Army" and "Reply of DPRK" and introductory documentaries "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Extravaganza Arirang."
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the function held in Finland.

articles.title: Documentary Film on Korean People's Victory in War Produced in Iran
articles.content:
Documentary Film on Korean People's Victory in War Produced in Iran
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Iran produced a documentary film introducing the heroic struggle of the Korean people and disclosing the true colors of the U.S. imperialists as the provoker of war and aggressor during the last Korean war (1950-1953).
					 The film has scenes showing President Kim Il Sung standing by a table for operational plans at the supreme command and meeting soldiers of the Korean People's Army. It deals with the shining victory won by the Korean people in the war under the wise leadership of the President.
					
					 It gives a detailed account of the original strategic and tactical policies set forth by the President and the heroic struggle waged by the army and the people of the DPRK to implement them. 
					
					 The film cites relics on display at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum to prove that the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean war by instigating the south Korean puppet clique for the purpose of destroying the young DPRK in its cradle and committed all sorts of atrocities and show the miserable end of the aggressors. 
					
					 The film was shown by the Iranian Television on April 23.

articles.title: FGSC denuncia represion fascista contra habitantes surcoreanos
articles.content:
FGSC denuncia represion fascista contra habitantes surcoreanos
  Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea hizo publica el dia 4 una declaracion condenando a las autoridades titeres surcoreanas que reprimen la justa lucha de los obreros y otros habitantes surcoreanos que con motivo del Primero de Mayo, se rebelaron contra las acciones vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias, la confrontacion fratricida, la dominacion fascista y la politica antipopular que practica la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					  En ocasion de dicha efemeride, -prosigue la nota- tuvieron lugar en el Sur de Corea el "Acto de todo el pueblo por el Primero de Mayo" con la presencia de mas de 50 mil ciudadanos y miembros de mas de 500 entidades civiles y sociales y partidos politicos como la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y el mitin de los habitantes de distintos sectores en memoria de los evacuados de la zona de Ryongsan de Seul en ocasion del centesimo dia desde que estos fueron asesinados salvajemente mientras luchaban por defender su cuna de vida.
					
					  Pero, la horda del traidor Lee reprimio brutalmente esos actos y arresto a centenares de participantes calificandolos de "ilegales", revela.
					
					  Esta represion de la pandilla de Lee deviene una atrocidad fascista y acto criminal contra los obreros y otros surcoreanos de distintos sectores que luchan por la nueva politica democratica y la nueva vida, califica.
					
					  Las llamas de la lucha masiva encendidas en el Sur de Corea con motivo del dia internacional de los trabajadores significan la explosion del rencor y la colera de la poblacion surcoreana por la horda de Lee que le impuso insoportables desgracias y sufrimientos y llevo a la peor fase las relaciones Norte-Sur, senala.
					
					  Es muy natural y justo que los obreros y otros habitantes surcoreanos se alzaran generalmente en todas partes en la lucha antigubernamental levantando las consignas "!No a la firma del Tratado de Libre Comercio Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos!", "!Resuelvan el problema de la tragedia de Ryongsan!", "!Rechazamos la institucion de 'las leyes infames de MB'!", "!Promuevan el dialogo y los proyectos de cooperacion Sur-Norte!", "!Que se retire el poder de Lee Myung Bak!", etc., subraya el documento.
					
					  La brutal campana represora de la camarilla de Lee resulta los ultimos esfuerzos desesperados de los compinches del traidor Lee, que estan a punto de arruinarse, y desata las protestas mas fuertes de los habitantes, apunta.
					
					  La banda de Lee debe dejar de reprimir de inmediato a los habitantes de distintos sectores que se levantaron por la libertad y los derechos democraticos y excarcelar ahora mismo a los arrestados, concluye la declaracion.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana se refiere al desarrollo economico y social
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana se refiere al desarrollo economico y social
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- Al hacer uso de la palabra el 28 de abril en la 65a asamblea general de la Comision Economica y Social de Asia y el Pacifico de la ONU sesionada en Tailandia, el jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se refirio al problema del desarrollo economico y social sostenido de esta region.
					  En el futuro tambien el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hara aporte a los esfuerzos regionales por alcanzar el objetivo del desarrollo para el milenio mediante las labores para el desarrollo economico y la solucion del problema de viveres del pais, dijo y continuo:
					
					  En la actualidad, la gran fluctuacion de los precios de viveres y petroleo y el cambio climatico crean junto con la ampliacion de la nueva crisis financiera las dificultades ante el desarrollo economico y social y el logro del objeto del desarrollo para el  milenio de la region de Asia y el Pacifico.
					
					  Frente a la mas grave crisis de viveres en la actualidad es imprescindible que todos los paises deben incrementar decisivamente la produccion de cereales en el principio de autoabastecimiento de viveres para cubrir satisfactoriamente con sus propias fuerzas la demanda domestica de viveres y fortalecer los esfuerzos regionales para asegurar la continuidad del desarrollo agricola  de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					  Tambien, frente al desafio y amenaza creados por el cambio climatico y la crisis de energia, los paises desarrollados deben ejecutar con fidelidad su deber por la reduccion de la cantidad de emision del gas de invernadero, ofrecer sin condicion la inversion y el traspaso tecnico a los paises en vias de desarrollo y eliminar las barreras artificiales que obstaculizan el comercio exterior de estos.
					
					  Todas las politicas y labores deben ser dirigidas al  desarrollo sostenido y el logro del objeto del desarrollo para el  milenio, y en este problema es importante el papel coordinador de la Comision Economica y Social de Asia y el Pacifico de la ONU.
					
					  Bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se  despliega la vigorosa lucha por producir grandes innovaciones en todos los dominios de la economia nacional y solucionar con sus propias fuerzas el problema de viveres al concentrar y movilizar todas las fuerzas en  las faenas agricolas.

articles.title: Direccion nortena de la APRP condena la represion a la SE
articles.content:
Direccion nortena de la APRP condena la represion a la SE
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- El portavoz de la Direccion Nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) publico el dia 5 una declaracion condenando el acto fascista de la banda de Lee Myung Bak que definio la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte del 15 de Junio como "entidad pro-enemiga" y condeno a duras penas a sus miembros medulares en virtud de la infame y fascista "ley de seguridad", que se opone a la reunificacion.
					  La Solidaridad de Ejecucion ha sido apoyada y encomiada por los connacionales porque siempre estuvo al frente de la ejecucion de la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur bajo cualesquier circunstancias adversas con el unico deseo de adelantar la reunificacion de la patria, anhelo de toda la nacion coreana, senala la nota y continua:
					
					 Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas tildaron de ilegales las actividades de esa entidad y enjuiciaron a sus miembros medulares declarandolos culpables.
					
					 Esta locura la pueden cometer solo los gangsteres opositores a la reunificacion como la banda de Lee que impide siniestramente la ejecucion de las declaraciones Norte-Sur, que desea toda la nacion coreana, y desafia frontalmente a la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion.
					
					 El pleito contra la SE no es un asunto limitado de la misma sino el preludio de la violenta campana de las autoridades de seguridad publica para reprimir todas las justas luchas patrioticas de las fuerzas partidarias de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de los habitantes surcoreanos por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.
					
					 De esta manera, quedo revelada la sucia intencion de la banda de Lee Myung Bak de sofocar todos los movimientos por la reunificacion.
					
					  Si ella sigue recurriendo a la represion a las fuerzas partidarias de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio a pesar de la unanime protesta y denuncia de toda la nacion coreana, sera castigada severamente por esta.
					
					  Esa camarilla de traidores debe revocar de inmediato el calificativo de "pro-enemigas" sobre las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion y liberar a las personalidades patrioticas condenadas injustamente.

articles.title: Tendra lugar la conferencia de ciudades hermanadas Corea-China
articles.content:
Tendra lugar la conferencia de ciudades hermanadas Corea-China
  Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tendra lugar la conferencia de las ciudades hermanadas entre Corea y China bajo la gran atencion y esperanza de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					  En la ocasion se intercambiaran los exitos y experiencias logrados en el desarrollo de las relaciones entre las provincias y ciudades hermanadas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Popular China y se discutiran los problemas para establecer tales relaciones y desarrollar en el futuro el intercambio y la cooperacion entre varias ciudades de ambos paises.
					
					  Ese evento, que se efectuara en este "Ano de amistad Corea-China" (2009), contribuira a consolidar las relaciones de amistad, valiosa riqueza preparada por los revolucionarios de veterana generacion de los dos paises, y a celebrar con originalidad el ano de amistad.
